column5: Hey guys , I am looking to go fishing and camping around Lake O and I'd like to know if the salmon have started to get close to the creeks. Thanks for your help,   Pepe
I take it you haven't been around for a couple days

The salmon arrived last Friday, Aug 20 @ 5:23 in the AM. They will run until exactly Tuesday, Oct 5 @ 10:33.  Just couldn't resist. If you've been on the board in the last week you'll know why.  But to answer your question, yes, if you look around a little you may get into a few.
I was down by the river and the salmon were all replaced by 400 scraggly looking creatures carrying swimming pool nets and treble hooks the size of a rake blade.  Why they needed both was beyond me.
Due to the lack of rain this year , the salmon run has been cancelled. Refunds can be picked up at your nearest mnr office.
Stop in and see Roy, he will give you all the advice you need...
Roy is gonna hate me for this but I found a lot here, and barely any fisherman. 43.352241,-80.329469
There are a few fish there and not too many fishermen at all. You'll need a good sized spool though cause there's about 7,000 FOW at that spot in the North Atlantic.

The Salmon Feature.....  And They're Off.....  Old boots has gone to the lead........Marshmallows are too a bait sits second....  ...3rd on the rail is flossers forever......Don't give away my spot is 4th......  Steelheaders have secrets is 5th on the outside.... and earplugs and treble hooks rounds out the field...
